patthana1.16:8.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:8.2: micchattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.16:9.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:10.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:10.2: micchattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana1.16:11.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:12.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:12.2: aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:12.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:12.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana1.16:12.9: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.16:12.12: Mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.16:13.1: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:13.2: micchattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.16:14.1: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:14.2: sammattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.16:16.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.16:16.2: micchattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:17.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.16:17.2: sammattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:18.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.16:18.2: aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:18.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:21.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
patthana1.16:26.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:26.2: ahetukaṃ aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:26.15: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.16:28.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.16:30.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:31.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:32.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:32.2: aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:32.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana1.16:34.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati naanantarapaccayā.
patthana1.16:37.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.16:41.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.16:45.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ … pe … vigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.16:53.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:54.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:55.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:55.2: aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:55.8: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā;
patthana1.16:56.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:57.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:58.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:58.2: vatthuṃ paccayā micchattaniyatā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #4
patthana1.16:59.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:59.2: vatthuṃ paccayā sammattaniyatā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #5
patthana1.16:60.1: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:60.2: micchattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:61.1: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:61.2: micchattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana1.16:62.1: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:62.2: micchattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:62.6: micchattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana1.16:63.1: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana1.16:65.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.16:68.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.16:72.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:72.2: ahetukaṃ aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:72.8: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā.
patthana1.16:72.17: Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.16:74.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.16:76.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:77.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:78.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:78.2: aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:79.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:80.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:81.1: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:81.2: micchattaniyate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā micchattaniyatādhipati. #1
patthana1.16:82.1: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:82.2: sammattaniyate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā sammattaniyatādhipati. #1
patthana1.16:84.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato dhammo uppajjati naanantarapaccayā … pe …
patthana1.16:87.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane pañca, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.16:91.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane pañca, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.16:95.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.16:103.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:103.2: micchattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:104.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:104.2: sammattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:105.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:105.2: aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:107.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … pe …
patthana1.16:110.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.16:114.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.16:114.2: ahetukaṃ aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:116.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:117.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:118.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.16:118.2: aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:120.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.16:120.2: arūpe sammattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:121.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.16:121.2: arūpe aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:122.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā.
patthana1.16:124.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana1.16:124.2: aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.16:125.1: Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā, navipākapaccayā.
patthana1.16:126.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—
patthana1.16:127.1: Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.16:127.2: arūpe sammattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:128.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.16:128.2: arūpe aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:131.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.16:134.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.16:137.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.16:145.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:145.2: micchattaniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:146.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:146.2: micchattaniyatā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:147.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:147.2: micchattaniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:148.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:149.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:149.2: aniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:151.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:151.2: ariyā micchattaniyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.16:151.7: Micchattaniyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:152.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:152.4: Sammattaniyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:153.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:153.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:153.3: Ariyā aniyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.16:153.7: vatthuṃ aniyate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti, taṃ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.16:153.10: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena aniyatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana1.16:153.16: Aniyatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:154.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:154.6: Yaṃ vatthuṃ parāmasantassa micchattaniyatā khandhā uppajjanti, taṃ vatthu micchattaniyatānaṃ khandhānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:155.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:157.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:158.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:159.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:159.3: micchattaniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:160.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:161.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:161.4: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.16:162.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:162.3: sammattaniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:163.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:163.4: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā … pe …
patthana1.16:163.6: ariyā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:163.11: aniyate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā aniyato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.16:163.13: aniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:164.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:166.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:167.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:168.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:168.2: purimā purimā aniyatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ aniyatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:168.7: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:169.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:169.2: aniyataṃ domanassaṃ micchattaniyatassa domanassassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:170.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:172.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisaṃ) …
patthana1.16:174.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:175.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:175.5: mātaraṃ jīvitā voropetvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.16:175.10: duṭṭhena cittena tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādetvā … pe …
patthana1.16:175.12: saṃghaṃ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti. #2
patthana1.16:176.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:176.3: paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.16:176.5: tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:177.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:177.5: ariyā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādenti, uppannaṃ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti.
patthana1.16:178.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:178.5: aniyataṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ … pe …
patthana1.16:178.8: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.16:178.29: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:179.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:179.5: aniyataṃ rāgaṃ upanissāya mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeti … pe …
patthana1.16:179.13: senāsanaṃ upanissāya mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeti … pe …
patthana1.16:180.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:180.5: paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa … pe …
patthana1.16:180.7: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:182.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:182.6: vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.16:182.11: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.16:183.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:184.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:186.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:186.2: pacchājātā micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:187.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:187.2: Pacchājātā sammattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:188.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:188.2: pacchājātā aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:190.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:190.2: purimā purimā aniyatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ aniyatānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:191.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:191.2: aniyataṃ domanassaṃ micchattaniyatassa domanassassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:192.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:194.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:194.2: micchattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:195.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:195.4: micchattaniyatā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:195.6: micchattaniyatā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:196.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:196.2: micchattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:197.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:197.2: sammattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:198.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:198.4: sammattaniyatā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:198.6: sammattaniyatā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:199.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:199.2: sammattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:200.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:200.4: aniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:200.8: aniyatā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:202.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:202.2: vipāko aniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.16:204.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:206.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:206.4: micchattaniyatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:206.6: micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:207.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:207.4: sammattaniyatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:207.6: sammattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:208.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:208.4: aniyatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:208.15: aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:209.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:210.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:212.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:212.2: micchattaniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:213.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:213.4: micchattaniyatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:213.6: micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:214.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:214.2: micchattaniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …. #3
patthana1.16:215.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.16:216.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:216.4: aniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.16:216.19: vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.16:216.22: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.16:216.31: aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:217.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:218.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:219.1: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:219.4: micchattaniyato eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …. #1
patthana1.16:220.1: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.16:220.4: micchattaniyatā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:220.6: micchattaniyatā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:220.8: micchattaniyatā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:221.1: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.16:224.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate terasa.
patthana1.16:227.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:228.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:229.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:230.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:231.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:232.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:233.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.16:234.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.16:235.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.16:236.1: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā micchattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.16:237.1: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.16:238.1: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā sammattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.16:239.1: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.16:243.1: Nahetuyā terasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare terasa, nasahajāte nava, naaññamaññe nava, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte ekādasa, napacchājāte terasa, naāsevane terasa, nakamme navipāke naāhāre terasa … pe … namagge terasa, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte satta, noatthiyā satta, nonatthiyā terasa, novigate terasa, noavigate satta.
patthana1.16:247.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta … pe … namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.16:251.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate terasa.
